Name: FundyLongShort
Text: @DumbLuckCapital That's some tall cotton right there.  We had some good ones, but nothing in that league.  The Petrus wasn't tired?

Name: FundyLongShort
Text: @jonsticha EXACTLY.  Amazing that the Dems as a whole cannot see this.  Wait, maybe they don't have an alternative vision that's compelling.
